snippet: The BodyCartography Project and other performers presented socially unorthodox works at the Abrons Arts Center as part of the American Realness festival.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews eleven dance productions performed as part of 2013 American Realness dance festival at Abrams Underground Theater.
lead_paragraph: The BodyCartography Project and other performers presented socially unorthodox works at the Abrons Arts Center as part of the American Realness festival.

headline.seo: BodyCartography Project at American Realness Festival
headline.main: Maybe Naked, Curvy or Clumsy, and Probably Socially Unorthodox
headline.print_headline: Maybe Naked, Curvy or Clumsy, And Probably Socially Unorthodox
